channel.title: [REQ] Some help with some stuff =]
channel.description:
Hey there, i need help with making about 4 commands and adding a "Full report system" to MEGAscape's source code.
If you could help me, please email enumeric [at] aol.com or add it to msn
The commands i would like creating are: ::give #### # # (same as pickup command but gives item to another player) ::onduty (increases admin level 3's strength, defence and possibly speed?) ::offduty (puts admin level 3's stuff back to normal) ::teleother #### # # (Teleport another person to set co-ordinates)
I hope you can help, thankyou.
- Dan.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 08, 2006, 11:43:17 AM[/size][hr]Could someone help me please?

item.title: [REQ] Some help with some stuff =]
item.dc:creator: @1stimeCoder 1stimeCoder
item.description:
@1stimeCoder wrote:

Those are some pretty basic commands. The “Full Report System” Is found under “Help With your Server” (I think thats what it is called. Use your “Search” button or use “Google” and type in

“How to add commands to a moparscape server.”
I hope this helps!

Read full topic

Hey there, i need help with making about 4 commands and adding a “Full report system” to MEGAscape’s source code.
